statements: SELECT * FROM TradeMatchingEngine ORDER BY trade_id ASC;
SELECT trade_id, timestamp, buy_order_id FROM TradeMatchingEngine WHERE buy_quantity > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sell_order_id, sell_quantity FROM TradeMatchingEngine WHERE sell_quantity < 50 ORDER BY sell_quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM TradeMatchingEngine WHERE buy_quantity = sell_quantity;
SELECT buy_order_id, sell_order_id, timestamp FROM TradeMatchingEngine WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM TradeMatchingEngine WHERE buy_quantity > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT trade_id, timestamp, buy_order_id, sell_quantity FROM TradeMatchingEngine WHERE buy_quantity < 50 ORDER BY trade_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT buy_order_id, sell_order_id, SUM(buy_quantity) AS total_buy_quantity FROM TradeMatchingEngine GROUP BY buy_order_id, sell_order_id HAVING total_buy_quantity > 500;
SELECT * FROM TradeMatchingEngine WHERE buy_order_id = 1002 OR sell_order_id = 2005 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 20;
SELECT trade_id, buy_order_id, sell_order_id FROM TradeMatchingEngine WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY trade_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM BuyOrders;
SELECT instrument, quantity FROM SellOrders;
SELECT order_id, instrument, price FROM BuyOrders WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM SellOrders WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT instrument, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM BuyOrders GROUP BY instrument;
SELECT * FROM BuyOrders WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT instrument, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM SellOrders GROUP BY instrument HAVING total_quantity > 500;
SELECT instrument, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM BuyOrders GROUP BY instrument ORDER BY average_price DESC;
SELECT BuyOrders.order_id, SellOrders.quantity FROM BuyOrders JOIN SellOrders ON BuyOrders.order_id = SellOrders.order_id;
SELECT * FROM BuyOrders WHERE instrument LIKE 'AAPL%' OR instrument LIKE '%GOOGL';
SELECT * FROM trade_orders;
SELECT order_id, order_type, order_quantity FROM trade_orders WHERE order_status = 'OPEN';
SELECT order_id, order_quantity, order_price FROM trade_orders WHERE order_type = 'SELL' ORDER BY order_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM buy_orders WHERE buy_price > 100;
SELECT sell_order_id, sell_quantity FROM sell_orders WHERE sell_price < 50 ORDER BY sell_quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM trade_orders WHERE order_quantity > 100 ORDER BY order_price DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT order_id, order_type, order_status FROM trade_orders WHERE order_price <= 5000
SELECT buy_order_id, buy_order_type, buy_quantity FROM buy_orders WHERE buy_status='Pending' ORDER BY buy_quantity ASC
SELECT * FROM sell_orders WHERE sell_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 AND sell_quantity > 10
SELECT sell_order_id, sell_quantity, sell_price FROM sell_orders ORDER BY sell_price ASC, sell_quantity DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM buy_orders ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT symbol, price FROM sell_orders WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT order_id, symbol, quantity FROM buy_orders WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM sell_orders WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT symbol, price, quantity FROM buy_orders UNION SELECT symbol, price, quantity FROM sell_orders;
SELECT * FROM buy_orders WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT symbol, quantity FROM sell_orders WHERE quantity >= 100 AND symbol = 'AAPL' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT trade_price, trade_quantity FROM order_book WHERE trade_quantity < 50 ORDER BY trade_timestamp DESC;
SELECT buy_order_id, sell_order_id FROM trade_history WHERE trade_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY trade_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM buy_orders bo JOIN sell_orders so ON bo.order_id = so.order_id WHERE bo.quantity > so.quantity ORDER BY bo.timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM trades ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, quantity, price FROM buy_orders WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT trade_id, symbol, quantity FROM trades WHERE quantity >= 100 ORDER BY trade_id;
SELECT * FROM sell_orders WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, username, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT symbol, quantity, price FROM trades WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM buy_orders WHERE price >= 50.00 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT symbol, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sell_orders GROUP BY symbol HAVING total_quantity > 500 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT t.symbol, t.quantity, t.price, u.username FROM trades t INNER JOIN user_accounts u ON t.symbol = u.username WHERE u.balance > 1000;

SELECT mt.trade_id, bo.symbol AS buy_symbol, so.symbol AS sell_symbol FROM matched_trades mt INNER JOIN buy_orders bo ON mt.buy_order_id = bo.order_id INNER JOIN sell_orders so ON mt.sell_order_id = so.order_id;
